timeline.bodyText: not sure that 'characteristic' is a good term to use here, it's not a common word, and is likely to be confusing
timeline.author: timja
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,5 @@ +

+ When checked, characteristic environment variables will be retained in addition to the variables listed above.

replies.bodyText:
That's what they're called 🤷 There's just not another good term for them.
I'd rather not extend this to "any magic Jenkins job related variable"; these serve a specific purpose (even if changes over the years have diluted it).
replies.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText:
While it's not common, it is used. I find that the following sentence does a sufficiently good job of clarifying what the term means.
I propose resolving this conversation unless someone else has additional comments.
replies.author: jeffret-b
